nodes.text: Crovendif was a male drug dealer who worked for the Black Sun Sector Chief Avrak Villachor in Iltarr City on the planet Wukkar. In 0 ABY, Crovendif was approached by the Imperial Intelligence agent Dayja, who was posing as a street criminal as part of a ploy to steal Black Sun's blackmail files, and the agent convinced Crovendif that he had access to a new source of glitterstim spice and wanted to make a deal with Villachor. Crovendif later encountered Dayja once more several days later and he escorted Dayja at blasterpoint to meet with Villachor.
